name: Nothing But Time
description:
Goal / Mechanics

Your goal in Nothing But Time is to travel to the center of the Galaxy, and the only way to do that is to warp jump a total of 10 times. Only then will you find the treasure that awaits at the center of creation. You must do whatever it takes to survive because you are all alone in this galaxy. The primary resources to collect are wood and carbon.

  • Inventory System
  • Random Solar System Generation
  • Random Terrain Generation
  • Build Menu
  • Crafting Menu
  • Skeleton Graveyards
  • Saving/Loading
